text: Ratu Seru Raveive Rabeni (27 December 1978 â€“ 15 March 2016) was a Fijian rugby union player. He played as a centre or wing. He played for the Fiji national rugby union team from 2000 through 2011. Rabeni was known in both club and international level for his physicality and bone crunching tackles, earning him the nickname "Rambo". Rabeni died in Fiji from a heart attack on 15 March 2016, aged 37. ==References== ==Other websites== * Leeds profile * Tigers profile * Fiji profile * Pacific Islanders profile * Scrum profile Category:1978 births Category:2016 deaths Category:Deaths from myocardial infarction Category:Fijian rugby union players
title: Seru Rabeni
